name: height
description: Height of the SVG (number interpreted as px). Defaults to '100'.

name: width
description: Width of the SVG (number interpreted as px). Defaults to '100'.

name: color
description: Primary color applied to the progress circle. Defaults to DEFAULT_COLOR.

name: strokeWidth
description: Stroke width of the progress circle. Affects the thickness of the circular line.

name: secondaryColor
description: Color of the background/secondary circle. Optional background indicator.

name: animationDuration
description: Duration of the rotation animation in seconds. Controls animation speed.

name: ariaLabel
description: Accessible label announced to screen readers. Defaults to 'circular-progress-loading'.

name: wrapperStyle
description: Inline style object applied to the wrapper element.

name: wrapperClass
description: CSS class applied to the wrapper for custom styling.

name: visible
description: When false, the loader is not rendered. Defaults to true.

name: colors
description:
Provide multiple colors to render a gradient instead of a solid color.
When 2 or more colors are supplied a gradient will be applied to the progress circle.

name: gradientType
description: Type of gradient (linear or radial). Defaults to linear.

name: gradientAngle
description: Angle (in degrees) applied via rotate() transform for linear gradients.
